    public class HomomorphicCommitmentPoK.Prover
extends ProtocolPartyBase
implements SigmaProtocol.Prover<Triplet<C,P,R>>, CommitmentPoK.Prover<C,P,R>
    Represents the prover in the commitment proof-of-knowledge protocol.
